description:
Whether your perfect day on the slopes starts with a dawn patrol, a helicopter ride, or lining up for the first chair, Sweet Protection’s newest helmet has you covered. Designed to keep the weight down and the safety high, the Winder MIPS helmet will help protect you on the snow. Outfitted with MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology; should you take a spill, rotational forces are reduced, so you can confidently focus on the feature in front of you, not what happens if you don’t stick the landing.

  • In mold construction is lightweight and allows impact force to spread out, reducing the amount of force that makes it to you
  • MIPS® helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash
  • Dial in the perfect fit with an adjustable dial fit system that provides a precise and comfortable fit
  • Rear strap lets you secure your goggles to your helmet
  • Sound chip ready so you can enjoy your favourite tunes on the slopes (sold separately)
  • Goggle garage helps pull warm air away from your goggles, reducing fogging
  • 10 air vents let your head breathe
  • Removable moisture wicking liner is soft and easy to pop in the wash
name: SWEET PROTECTION Winder Mips Helmet - Unisex
